item.title: Arch Linux
item.description: index Cleanup Routine Commands: pacman, yay sudo pacman -Rns $(pacman -Qdtq) # remove repo orphans yay -Rns $(yay -Qdtq) # remove AUR orphans sudo paccache -r # trim repo package cache yay -Sc # trim yay build cache cargo: cargo cache cargo cache -a uv: uv cache clean.
